actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: Resolution providing for the printing of the booklet entitled "The History and Operation of the House Majority Whip Organization (94th Congress)."

summary.text: Provides for the printing of the booklet entitled "The History and Operation of the House Majority Whip Organization (94th Congress)," and the printing of 10,000 additional copies for use by the House majority whip.

titles.title: Resolution providing for the printing of the booklet entitled "The History and Operation of the House Majority Whip Organization (94th Congress)."
